title: Craig Bellamy
summary: Craig Douglas Bellamy (born 13 July 1979) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as a forward. He most recently managed the under-21 team of Belgian side Anderlecht. Born in Cardiff, Bellamy began his senior playing career with Norwich City, where he made his professional debut in 1996. He signed for Premier League side Coventry City in 2000, breaking the club's record transfer fee, but suffered relegation in his only season. He joined Newcastle United the following year where he helped the club achieve two top-four finishes during a four year spell.
